PASSWORD_SENT_MESSAGE: A new password has been sent to the email you provided.
CONGRATULATION: Congratulation ! your email has been verified successfully.
FAILED: There was an error validation your email please try again later.
CONNECTION_ERROR: There was an error connecting to the server,please check the internet connection and try again
ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to delete ?
AT_LEAST: must be at least {{ number }} characters
DO_NOT_HAVE_ACCOUNT: Don't have an account yet ? Sign up
PLEASE_PROVIDE_EMAIL: Please enter the email address you used to register, we will sent you a message that contains the new password.
USER_NOT_FOUND: This email is not registred to any of our users.
TERM_1_DESCRIPTION: you are responsible for the content you publish, We are not responsible for any illegal content you publish on our site,however if you didn't respect  any  of the rules below your account or your posts will be delete.
TERM_2_DESCRIPTION: By posting spam posts of comments you are risking your account to be deleted.
TERM_3_DESCRIPTION: this platform is a friendly place for students to meet and any insult of any type to any person will cause the deletion of your account.
TERM_4: Fake your information as you want
TERM_4_DESCRIPTION: you may fake you informations as you want however this may affect the recommended publications for you.
WE_ARE: We are a students of the NTIC faculty, we created this new space to share knowledge and communicate. We welcome you and we hope you join our community.
HOW_TO_PUBLISH: How to publish on the platfrome ?
TO_PUBLISH: In order to publish a content, you need to be registred and logged in, then you can go to the publications page, click add and fill the form and finally submit.
TO_DOWNLOAD: To be able to download attachements you need to be logged in.
HOW_TO_ADD_FRIEND: How to add or remove a friend ?
TO_ADD_FRIEND: To add/remove a friend go to the chat page and select a friend and click either add or remove.
TO_CHAT: Select the person you want to chat with, and send a chat request if your request is accepted a message box will be displayed and can send/recive messages.
TO_REGISTER: To register click the register link from the toolbar, fill the form with a valid email, agree the trems and submit. you will be emailed with verification email.
TO_RECOVER_PASSWORD: To recover your password click the link I forgot my password and enter the email you registre with.
NAME: Name
TITLE: Title
SAVE_PUB_BEFORE_ATTACH: Before you add attachments you have to save the publication first.
QUESTIONS_DESCRIPTION: Ask a question to your colleuges
MEMORIES_DESCRIPTION: Download or upload memories of the previous years
SCIENTIFIC_CLUBS_DESCRIPTION: View the latest activities of scientific clubs
